joinRoomAndStart: Join a room and start to poker!
joinRoomInfo: You can also join an existing room, if you know its name. Ask the creator of the room for the URL.
name: Name...
provideUsernameInfo: Your colleagues would like to know who you are. Please provide us with your name.
gravatarInfo: If you enter your Gravatar email address, your Gravatar icon will be displayed.
disclaimer: Use Poinz at your own risk! Be aware that all information that you enter is potentially publicly available!
spectatorInfo: Spectators cannot participate in estimations. They still can add and modify stories.
autoRevealInfo: Stories are automatically revealed when all users estimated.
noActiveStories: There are currently no stories in the estimation backlog...
exportInfo: You can export the stories and estimations in your room as json file.
customCardsInfo: Use a custom set of estimation cards. If the room contains already estimated stories, you might get unexpected results...
customCardsJsonError: Sorry, we cannot parse the input to JSON!
customCardsDuplicateError: Make sure that you have unique values!
roomIsProtected: This room is protected by a password
roomIsNotProtected: This room is currently not protected by a password
passwordProtectionInfo: Rooms can be protected by a password in order to prevent unauthorized users to join. Even if they know the room id.
confidenceUnsureTitle: I 'm not at all confident about this story
confidenceDefaultTitle: Neither unsure nor very sure about this story
confidenceVerySureTitle: I'm very confident about this story
confidenceInfo: Allow users to specify whether they are unsure (not confident) or very sure (very confident) when estimating a story.
